name: Fluid Structure Interaction
body:
#Phase 1: Develop a fully coupled monolithic solver
First phase is to make a consistent solver which will yield accurate results at the cost of speed. For
verification of implementation we will use [Turek](http://citeseerx.ist.psu.edu/viewdoc/download?doi=10.1.1.550.1689&rep=rep1&type=pdf) as reference. 
We will explore and use the different testcases derived in this paper for comparison of our Fluid, Structure and FSI implementation. 
As an extension we will consider both Arbitrary Lagrangian Eulerian and a fully Eulerian description for the FSI models. 

## Verification of Fluid solver
1. CFD1 : CHECK!
2. CFD2 : CHECK!
3. CFD3 : Minor errors in the Drag Calculations, will be solved after Structure is fully implemented

## Verification of Structure solver
1. CSM1 : Lagrangian formulation implemented
2. CSM2 : Lagrangian formulation implemented

### CSM3, Lagrangian formulation progress:
* IMPLEMENTED: MixedFunctionSpace solving displacement and velocity in one equation
* IMPLEMENTED: VectorSpace solving only displacement.

### CSM3, Eulerian formulation progress:
* DEVELOPMENT: Fully implicit solver for MixedFunctionSpace implemented on master branch, but results in damping
* DEVELOPMENT: Cranc-Nicolson formulation of MixedFunctionSpace implemented on AndyStruc branch. 
  - Newton-iterations fail to converge during timestepping. 
* DEVELOPMENT: VectorSpace solving only displacement implemented on AndyStruc branch. 
  - Newton-iterations fail to converge during timestepping. 

## Main strategy
- Ensuring the numerical implementations are centred correctly 
- Handling of the convection term in the Lagrangian formulation, when calculating deformation. 
- Implementation of alternative numerical schemes:
 - Frac-step
 - [Newmark](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Newmark-beta_method)
 - Adam-bashford [Linear multistep methods](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Linear_multistep_method#Adams.E2.80.93Bashforth_methods)

## Verification of FSI solver 
* Will begin once Eulerian formulation of structure are working
